code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./GroupCodeInput.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GroupCodeInput=_ref=>{let{onGroupSet}=_ref;const[groupCode,setGroupCode]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!groupCode.trim()){alert('Please enter a group code');return;}setIsLoading(true);onGroupSet(groupCode.trim());setIsLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"group-code-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"group-code-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"group-code-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"snow-icon",children:"\u2744\uFE0F"}),"Join Your Group"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"group-code-subtitle",children:"Enter your group code to start sharing locations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"group-code-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:groupCode,onChange:e=>setGroupCode(e.target.value.toUpperCase()),placeholder:"Enter group code (e.g., SNOW2024)",className:"group-code-input",maxLength:20,disabled:isLoading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"group-code-button",disabled:isLoading||!groupCode.trim(),children:isLoading?'Joining...':'Join Group'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"group-code-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uD83D\uDCA1 Ask your group leader for the code"})})]})});};export default GroupCodeInput;
